snippet: A New York State judge asked Second Stage Theater and the owners of the Helen Hayes Theater to negotiate rather than continue to litigate the matter of the sale of the Hayes.
abstract: A New York State judge asked Second Stage Theater and the owners of the Helen Hayes Theater to negotiate rather than continue to litigate the matter of the sale of the Hayes.

headline.main: Judge Urges Settlement in Dispute Over Helen Hayes Theater
headline.print_headline: Parties Will Try to Settle Hayes Theater Dispute
